description: HC_ID: Primary key, auto-generated sequential ID. Format: auto-increment. Example: 12345
HC_DOMAIN: Company website domain - primary identifier. Format: lowercase, no protocol. Example: acme.com
HC_ORG_NAME: Legal or common company name from Hunter. Format: title case. Example: Acme Corporation
HC_HEADCOUNT_RAW: Employee count range as string. Format: range format: X-Y. Example: 51-200
HC_COUNTRY: Two-letter country code. Format: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2. Example: US
HC_STATE: State/province/region. Format: US state abbreviation or full name. Example: PA
HC_CITY: City name. Format: title case. Example: Pittsburgh
HC_POSTAL: ZIP or postal code. Format: varies by country. Example: 15213
HC_STREET: Street address line. Format: street address format. Example: 123 Main St
HC_EMAIL_PATTERN: Email pattern for generating addresses. Format: {first}.{last} format. Example: {first}.{last}
HC_COMPANY_TYPE: Company ownership type. Format: Hunter classification. Example: privately held
HC_INDUSTRY: Industry classification from Hunter. Format: Hunter industry taxonomy. Example: Construction
HC_ENRICHED_TS: When Hunter data was fetched. Format: ISO 8601. Example: 2026-02-03T12:00:00Z
HC_CREATED_TS: Record creation timestamp. Format: ISO 8601. Example: 2026-02-03T12:00:00Z
HC_UPDATED_TS: Last update timestamp. Format: ISO 8601. Example: 2026-02-03T12:00:00Z
HC_EMBEDDING: Semantic embedding for similarity search. Format: OpenAI ada-002 format. Example: [0.1, 0.2, ...]
HC_INDUSTRY_NORM: Cleaned/mapped industry category. Format: standardized taxonomy. Example: Construction
HC_HEADCOUNT_MIN: Minimum employee count from range. Format: positive integer. Example: 51
HC_HEADCOUNT_MAX: Maximum employee count from range. Format: positive integer. Example: 200
HC_LOCATION_FULL: Full address string for display. Format: concatenated address. Example: 123 Main St, Pittsburgh, PA 15213, US
HC_QUALITY: Composite data completeness score. Format: 0.00 to 1.00. Example: 0.85
HC_TAGS: Custom classification tags. Format: array of strings. Example: ["target", "priority"]
HC_SOURCE: Data source system. Format: source identifier. Example: hunter
HC_CT_ID: Link to company_target.company_unique_id. Format: UUID format. Example: a1b2c3d4-...
HC_OUTREACH_ID: Link to outreach.outreach.outreach_id. Format: UUID format. Example: a1b2c3d4-...
